bismuth.note.header.1: ATTENTION! THIS FILE SHOULD NOT BE FORMATTED BY INTELLIJ
bismuth.note.header.2: By default, IntelliJ removes newlines. This makes the file
bismuth.note.header.3: difficult to read by a human. Please add an exception to
bismuth.note.header.6: This file is used for language purposes. You can use
bismuth.note.header.7: the 'bismuth.note' prefix for comments. These won't be used by the mod.
bismuth.note.header.8: Please use 4 empty lines between sections, and 2 empty lines between
bismuth.note.header.9: sub-sections. This makes the file easier to read.
bismuth.note.keybind: All of the keybinds that we use. The category will always be 'bismuth.keybind.category'.
bismuth.note.rpc: All of the messages that we use for Discord RPC.
bismuth.command.version.description: Displays the version of Bismuth you have installed.
bismuth.command.version.error.nullContai: §cError: §7Received a null container from mod. Has the mod initialized?
bismuth.command.screenshot.description: Lists, opens, deletes, or copies screenshots.
bismuth.command.screenshot.error.noScree: §cError: §7No screenshots found. Try taking a screenshot first.
bismuth.command.screenshot.error.open: §cError: §7An unknown error occurred while opening the screenshot.
bismuth.command.screenshot.open.descript: Opens a screenshot in your computer's default image viewer.
bismuth.command.screenshot.copy.descript: Copies the content of a screenshot to your clipboard.
bismuth.command.screenshot.delete.messag:
§cAre you sure you want to delete %s? §7This cannot be undone.
§eRun the command again to confirm. This will expire in %s seconds.
bismuth.note.screenshot: These are used when the player takes a screenshot.
